name: Drone Gunner Alpha
description: First game i ever made. Its a arcade stile top down shooter with online leaderboards. Sadly the project ist lost due to a broken harddisk. I learned my lesson and will start developing other games now. This is the alpha version i was able to recover, i decided to upload this version and start a new project. the Song is from bensound.org. The game should be running in this state, sadly i wont be able to update it anymore. Stay tuned for new games and thank you for downloading Drone Gunner.
